update bus_car set dsnum = #{dsnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, eventType = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{statestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventid = #{eventid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rssi = #{rssi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dump_energy = #{dump_energy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from bus_car
and id like concat("%",#{id},"%")
and dsnum like concat("%",#{dsnum},"%")
and pressure like concat("%",#{pressure},"%")
and rssi like concat("%",#{rssi},"%")
and eventid=#{eventid}
